about_the_game:
This new game mode rebalances the whole game, removing the Stamina Points (SP) mechanic and introducing the more classic and straight forward HP & MP system, inspired by the first Doom & Destiny!

Armors will increase you Hit Points pool while all your powers will use Mana Points. Gone is the regeneration each turn, so be ready to manage your HP & MP between each combat!

This expansion also allows you to discover during any of your playthrough 5 new shields and 2 new potions!
